**What is the new region to support?**
us-west-2, ap-south-1..

**Does the region support all used services?**
Check if the region supports the following resources:
- Serverless Application Repository
- Lambda Function
- Lambda Layer
- Api Gateway
- EventBridge
- DynamoDB
- SSM Parameter
